text:
="preserve">Mahesh Kumar Kanodia (27 January 1937 – 25 October 2020) was an Indian politician. He represented the Patan constituency of Gujarat and was a member of the Bharatiya Janata Party. Before becoming a politician, he was a singer. Kanodia was born in Gujarat, India. Kanodia was a member of the Lok Sabha between 1991 to 2009.
Kanodia died in Mumbai on 25 October 2020, aged 83.
